hanzi-su-wiki:
粛

Значения

Тихий, спокойный; приводить в порядок

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Внизу — русло реки. В центре — водоворот с белой, как рис 米, пеной. Вверху — стилет для письма 聿. Смиренность и ум грамотного человека спасают его от омута невежественности.

Варианты

肅, 肃
purpleculture_pinyin:
sù
Japanese variant of 肃
Японский вариант 肃
rtega_mnemonic:
肅肅RS
肃肃		粛𢙻𦘛𦘜𦘝𦘡 pay respects, reverently
  • RS. hand stirring water 水: → 肅 → 粛 → 肃 washing hands in respect
heisig_story: Rake . . . rice . . . fenceposts. Take special care to draw this character in the same order as the primitive. Note too, that the fourth stroke for rice is already taken care of by the fourth stroke of rake.
koohiiStory1: Even though it´s a maddening task, the monks stay solemn as they rake rice between the fenceposts.
koohiiStory2: Note: This is not sieve as it has a full rice and not rice grains and the hook is missing from rake. Also the given stroke order is incorrect (fenceposts should come last).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A wolverine that sticks its legs in rice will become very solemn, very fast. This is weird to you because wolverines always seem so happy. Well his dad died from his legs getting stuck in rice, so just leave the poor solemn creature alone.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine if your dad died from getting his legs stuck in some rice, now feel solemn too.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Remember how solemn wolverine looked when his dad died? You hated seeing him like this so you ran up and shook (しゅく) him. You shook the solemn sadness right out of him! You should do that again now!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine seeing how violently you shook him. You shook him so hard his solemn mood disappeared!
Ru_Words:
慎むつつしむ
  • быть осмотрительным (сдержанным) в чём-л
  • воздерживаться от чего-л, хранить чистоту
    • 自粛じしゅく
  • самодисциплина, самоконтроль, самоограничение
    • warodai
    厳粛げんしゅく
  • торжественность, серьёзность, строгость
    • 粛清しゅくせい
  • чистка (в т.ч. политическая), избавление от кого-л.
    • 粛軍しゅくぐん
  • «чистка» [в] армии
    • warodai
    粛然としゅくぜんと
  • тихо, спокойно
  • почтительно
    • warodai
    粛々しゅくしゅく
  • торжественно
  • тихо, осторожно
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ノ, ヨ, 米 (рис), 隶 (раб)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: whereupon (ノ) with a slashed yo (肀) you take a stick (丨) to the rice (米) solemnly

粛字的基本解释

粛
sù
古同“肃”。

粛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》息逐切，入屋，心。］
亦作“粛1”。“肃1”的繁体字。
(1)恭敬。
(2)庄重；严肃。
(3)拜揖。
(4)多用于馈赠或书信，表示尊敬。
(5)引进；引导。
(6)严峻；严格。
(7)萎缩；肃杀。
(8)敏捷。
(9)肃静；幽静。
(10)犹儆戒。
(11)整理；整饬。
(12)清除；平靖。
(13)姓。周卿士成肃公之后。以谥为姓。或谓为肃慎氏之后。见《通志·氏族四》。
[②]［xiāo］
亦作“粛2”。同“蕭1”。
姓氏。

粛字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　粛； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页908第10
【字彙補】俗肅字。

粛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
粛
sù
Gu Tong "Su".
粛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
["Guangyun" cuts into the house, heart. ]
Also known as "粛1". The traditional characters of "SU1".
(1) Respectfully.
(2) solemn; solemn.
(3) Worship.
(4) It is mostly used for gifts or letters to show respect.
(5) Introduction; guidance.
(6) Severe; strict.
(7) Shrinking; killing.
(8) Agility.
(9) Quiet; quiet.
(10) Still wary.
(11) Finishing; trimming.
(12) Clear; Pingjing.
(13) Last name. After Zhou Qingshi became Su Gong. Take the posthumous name as the last name. Or after Sushenshi. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".
[②]［xiāo］
Also known as "粛2". Same as "Xiao 1".
Last name.

sù
яп. вм. 肃
Radicals: ヨ, 儿, 米  (wolverine, legs, rice, stick)
Meaning Mnemonic
A wolverine that sticks its legs in rice will become very solemn, very fast. This is weird to you because wolverines always seem so happy. Well his dad died from his legs getting stuck in rice, so just leave the poor solemn creature alone.
Imagine if your dad died from getting his legs stuck in some rice, now feel solemn too.
Reading Mnemonic
Remember how solemn wolverine looked when his dad died? You hated seeing him like this so you ran up and shook (しゅく) him. You shook the solemn sadness right out of him! You should do that again now!
Imagine seeing how violently you shook him. You shook him so hard his solemn mood disappeared!
